channel.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
channel.description:
I was just wondering how I could fix my Xbox 360, it has the Red Ring of Death or Doom, whichever you may call it. I have taken it apart, and did the towel trick. I CBF to send it in and get it repaired because I already have broken the seal.
Here is a song I found. IMO I think this song is pretty sweet. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=caVhBCsZqr0
I
[i]Please no disrespect or un-intelligent posts. If you simple do not care, don't post about it, just ignore this thread.
Thanks, ! WRT74 ![/i]

item.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:21, topic:261133”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=344842.msg2661137#msg2661137 date=1234206877]
This is why i buy my 360 modchipped already. I can open it up and to what the fuck i want and still get it replaced if it crashes :>
[/quote]

Where do you get those at? I’ve been wanting to get a 360 and chip it (to go with my awesome chipped Wii!) but haven’t because of the inevitable red ring. :)[/quote]I bought mine in some swedish modchip-service company. Was quite expensive due to the modchip’s price ($200 for chip itself), but i get lifetime free upgrades on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:22, topic:261133”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=344842.msg2661613#msg2661613 date=1234228505]

This is why i buy my 360 modchipped already. I can open it up and to what the fuck i want and still get it replaced if it crashes :>

Where do you get those at? I’ve been wanting to get a 360 and chip it (to go with my awesome chipped Wii!) but haven’t because of the inevitable red ring.
[/quote]Its a lot less common now…They stopped fixing the xbox 360’s and started sending new ones without an over heating problem.[/quote]Correct, the RRoD is a problem of the past really, ever since they down graded the power supply and changed some things inside it is no longer really a problem.

As for getting mod chips, xbox-scene.

Read full topic

item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:18, topic:261133”]The new HDMI update has caused the RRoD lately, so if you got the RRoD because of that update I will call you a fucking idiot from now on (if that’s not the cause I’ll still do that). Who the fuck tries to fix something while it’s still under warranty?[/quote]Because fixing it is simple and cheap…Sending it end is a waste of time and money.

item.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:18, topic:261133”]The new HDMI update has caused the RRoD lately, so if you got the RRoD because of that update I will call you a fucking idiot from now on (if that’s not the cause I’ll still do that). Who the fuck tries to fix something while it’s still under warranty?[/quote]Cus waiting 3 weeks is a waste of time when it can be fixed at home.

This is why i buy my 360 modchipped already. I can open it up and to what the fuck i want and still get it replaced if it crashes :>

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

The new HDMI update has caused the RRoD lately, so if you got the RRoD because of that update I will call you a fucking idiot from now on (if that’s not the cause I’ll still do that). Who the fuck tries to fix something while it’s still under warranty?

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Kane.:

Isn’t it free repair when you get the RRoD?

All consoles > 2007 comes with a free warranty on “General Harware Failiure”
If your console hasnt got this warranty do the towel trick go to a Video Game Store and Flog it!
The console should work for the 2 minitues it takes the guy to test it but wont after!

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:13, topic:261133”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=344842.msg2660131#msg2660131 date=1234128423]
Till it burns down your house.

I don’t get why you would even bother trying to fix it yourself when you have a 3 year warranty.
[/quote]Replacing the thermal paste would fix the over heating problem…not make it worse…[/quote]
But the overheating problem is not the only problem that causes the RROD. There are software based errors which have been known to cause that too, so if say - your xbox got the RROD due to it overheating, you fix that, voiding your warranty and then you get another RROD due to a software based error or another hardware problem that you don’t know how to fix?

Then what? You’re stuck. Which is why it is always best to just send it to microsoft.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 RRoD(?) and Song
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

WRT74:

That’s it? What you mean is that you clear off the glue, then put new glue on? How long will it last for?

Until you next leave it unattended and it overheats. Replacing the glue is all microdix does.

Read full topic
